Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value:
This Workflow integrates Salesforce with Sage Intacct. 
It retrieves Orders from Salesforce, verifies whether each has already been processed, and fetches the related Order Items and Account Details. If the customer doesn't exist in Sage Intacct, the Workflow creates it. 
It then maps the data and generates an invoice in Sage Intacct, logging a success or error for each processed Order.

Nodes.Name: VariableBar
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are setting the Group for the Key-Values

Nodes.Name: Formatter
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we display a message if the Customer ID has been found in the Key Values

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are logging the Key Value record for successful records.
We get the Group from the Variable bar.
We use the Order ID as the Key (Notice the fx on the input - you need to select which field in the payload is the Key.)
We use the Sage Response Key as the Value.

Nodes.Name: Salesforce
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are querying the Orders from Salesforce

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request" type="xs:string"/>
</xs:schema>
Properties.Name: Request
Properties.Value:
<Request>SELECT
	Id,
	OwnerId,
	ContractId,
	AccountId,
	Pricebook2Id,
	OriginalOrderId,
	EffectiveDate,
	EndDate,
	IsReductionOrder,
	Status,
	Description,
	CustomerAuthorizedById,
	CustomerAuthorizedDate,
	CompanyAuthorizedById,
	CompanyAuthorizedDate,
	Type,
	BillingStreet,
	BillingCity,
	BillingState,
	BillingPostalCode,
	BillingCountry,
	BillingLatitude,
	BillingLongitude,
	BillingGeocodeAccuracy,
	BillingAddress,
	ShippingStreet,
	ShippingCity,
	ShippingState,
	ShippingPostalCode,
	ShippingCountry,
	ShippingLatitude,
	ShippingLongitude,
	ShippingGeocodeAccuracy,
	ShippingAddress,
	Name,
	PoDate,
	PoNumber,
	OrderReferenceNumber,
	BillToContactId,
	ShipToContactId,
	ActivatedDate,
	ActivatedById,
	StatusCode,
	OrderNumber,
	TotalAmount,
	CreatedDate,
	CreatedById,
	LastModifiedDate,
	LastModifiedById,
	IsDeleted,
	SystemModstamp,
	LastViewedDate,
	LastReferencedDate
FROM Order WHERE Status = 'Activated' LIMIT 3</Request>

Nodes.Name: ForEach
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are splitting each order to be processed individually

Nodes.Name: GetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we check to see if the Order has been processed before by checking if a Key Value record has already been logged for this Order ID.

Nodes.Name: Salesforce
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are fetching the related Order Items for the Order

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request" type="xs:string"/>
</xs:schema>
Properties.Name: Request
Properties.Value:
<Request>SELECT
	Id,
	Product2Id,
	IsDeleted,
	OrderId,
	PricebookEntryId,
	OriginalOrderItemId,
	AvailableQuantity,
	Quantity,
	UnitPrice,
	ListPrice,
	TotalPrice,
	ServiceDate,
	EndDate,
	Description,
	CreatedDate,
	CreatedById,
	LastModifiedDate,
	LastModifiedById,
	SystemModstamp,
	OrderItemNumber
FROM OrderItem WHERE OrderId = '{OrderID}'</Request>

Nodes.Name: Salesforce
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are fetching the Customer Details based on the AccountId

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request" type="xs:string"/>
</xs:schema>
Properties.Name: Request
Properties.Value:
<Request>SELECT
	Id,
	IsDeleted,
	MasterRecordId,
	Name,
	Type,
	ParentId,
	BillingStreet,
	BillingCity,
	BillingState,
	BillingPostalCode,
	BillingCountry,
	BillingLatitude,
	BillingLongitude,
	BillingGeocodeAccuracy,
	BillingAddress,
	ShippingStreet,
	ShippingCity,
	ShippingState,
	ShippingPostalCode,
	ShippingCountry,
	ShippingLatitude,
	ShippingLongitude,
	ShippingGeocodeAccuracy,
	ShippingAddress,
	Phone,
	Fax,
	AccountNumber,
	Website,
	PhotoUrl,
	Sic,
	Industry,
	AnnualRevenue,
	NumberOfEmployees,
	Ownership,
	TickerSymbol,
	Description,
	Rating,
	Site,
	OwnerId,
	CreatedDate,
	CreatedById,
	LastModifiedDate,
	LastModifiedById,
	SystemModstamp,
	LastActivityDate,
	LastViewedDate,
	LastReferencedDate,
	Jigsaw,
	JigsawCompanyId,
	CleanStatus,
	AccountSource,
	DunsNumber,
	Tradestyle,
	NaicsCode,
	NaicsDesc,
	YearStarted,
	SicDesc,
	DandbCompanyId,
	flowgear__CustomerPriority__c,
	flowgear__SLA__c,
	flowgear__Active__c,
	flowgear__NumberofLocations__c,
	flowgear__UpsellOpportunity__c,
	flowgear__SLASerialNumber__c,
	flowgear__SLAExpirationDate__c,
	flowgear__ExternalId__c,
	flowgear__Location__c,
  (SELECT Name, FirstName, LastName from Contacts)
FROM Account WHERE Id = '{AccID}'</Request>

Nodes.Name: SageIntacct
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are checking to see if the Customer exists in Sage

Nodes.Name: IfVisualBasic
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here, the Execution Flow follows different paths depending on whether the customer exists in Sage:

* If the customer exists, the invoice is created directly in Sage.
* If the customer does not exist, a new customer is first created in Sage, followed by the invoice creation.

Nodes.Name: QuickMap
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we map the Order Items retrieved from Salesforce to the Sage Intacct format before creating the Invoice in Sage.

Properties.Name: Mapping
Properties.Value:
{"mappedElements":[{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Request/customerid","mapExpression":"GETVALUE("CustID")"},{"sourcePaths":["Response/records/CreatedDate"],"targetPath":"Request/datecreated/year","mapExpression":"FORMATDATE({CreatedDate}, <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="customerid" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="datecreated">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
              <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
              <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="dateposted">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
              <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
              <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="datedue">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
              <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
              <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="termname" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="batchkey" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
        <xs:element name="action" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="invoiceno" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
        <xs:element name="ponumber" type="xs:unsignedInt" />
        <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="externalid" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
        <xs:element name="billto">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="contactname" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="shipto">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="contactname" type="xs:unsignedInt" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="basecurr" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="currency" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="exchratedate">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
              <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
              <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="exchratetype" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="nogl" type="xs:boolean" />
        <xs:element name="supdocid" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
        <xs:element name="customfields">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="customfield">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="customfieldname" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="customfieldvalue" type="xs:string" />
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="invoiceitems">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="lineitem">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="accountlabel" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="offsetglaccountno" type="xs:unsignedInt" />
                    <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:decimal" />
                    <xs:element name="memo" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="locationid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="departmentid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="key" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="totalpaid" type="xs:decimal" />
                    <xs:element name="totaldue" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                    <xs:element name="customfields">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="customfield">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="customfieldname" type="xs:string" />
                                <xs:element name="customfieldvalue" type="xs:string" />
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="revrectemplate" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="defrevaccount" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
                    <xs:element name="revrecstartdate">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
                          <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                          <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="revrecenddate">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
                          <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                          <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="projectid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="customerid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="vendorid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="employeeid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="itemid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="classid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="warehouseid" type="xs:string" />
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>","targetSchemaType":1}

Nodes.Name: SageIntacct
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are creating the Invoice in Sage

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="customerid" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="datecreated">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />

            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="dateposted">

            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>

              <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
              <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="termname" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="batchkey" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
        <xs:element name="action" type="xs:string" />

        <xs:element name="ponumber" type="xs:unsignedInt" />
        <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="externalid" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
        <xs:element name="billto">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="contactname" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="shipto">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="contactname" type="xs:unsignedInt" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="basecurr" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="currency" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="exchratedate">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
              <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
              <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="exchratetype" type="xs:string" />
        <xs:element name="nogl" type="xs:boolean" />
        <xs:element name="supdocid" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
        <xs:element name="customfields">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="customfield">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="customfieldname" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="customfieldvalue" type="xs:string" />
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="invoiceitems">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="lineitem">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="accountlabel" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="offsetglaccountno" type="xs:unsignedInt" />
                    <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:decimal" />
                    <xs:element name="memo" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="locationid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="departmentid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="key" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="totalpaid" type="xs:decimal" />
                    <xs:element name="totaldue" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                    <xs:element name="customfields">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="customfield">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="customfieldname" type="xs:string" />
                                <xs:element name="customfieldvalue" type="xs:string" />
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="revrectemplate" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="defrevaccount" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
                    <xs:element name="revrecstartdate">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
                          <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                          <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="revrecenddate">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="year" type="xs:unsignedShort" />
                          <xs:element name="month" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                          <xs:element name="day" type="xs:unsignedByte" />
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="projectid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="customerid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="vendorid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="employeeid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="itemid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="classid" type="xs:string" />
                    <xs:element name="warehouseid" type="xs:string" />
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Nodes.Name: IfEqual
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are checking if the Invoice was created successfully in Sage by checking if it returned an error or not.

A successful Sage Response looks as follows:
<Response>
  <result>
    <status>success</status>
    <function>create_invoice</function>
    <controlid>638864426211810406</controlid>
    <key>1792</key>
  </result>
</Response>

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription:
Here we are logging the Key Value record for error records.
We get the Group from the Variable bar.
We use the Order ID as the Key (Notice the fx on the input - you need to select which field in the payload is the Key.)
We use the Sage Response as the Value.

Nodes.Name: QuickMap
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we map the customer data retrieved from Salesforce to the Sage Intacct format before creating the customer record in Sage.

                          <xs:element name="COUNTRY" type="xs:string"/>

Nodes.Name: SageIntacct
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are creating the Customer record in Sage

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">

    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>

Properties.Name: Request

Nodes.Name: IfEqual
Nodes.LongDescription: Once the Customer is created we are creating the Invoice

Name: Salesforce Orders To Sage Intacct Invoices
Description: This Workflow integrates Salesforce with Sage Intacct by retrieving and processing orders, including related items and customer data. It creates missing customers and generates invoices in Sage Intacct, logging the outcome for each order.
